website_summaries.verdict: Offers a secure holster that’s also easy to release when you need to grab the weapon.
pros: Includes a suede lining that keeps the weapon’s finish clean from damage
Uses standard 2.25-inch belt slots that hold the holster and weapon close to the body
Includes an Automatic Locking System that engages as soon as the weapon is holstered, but that releases quickly when you need the gun
cons: Doesn’t create as tight of a fit as some users will want

customer_reviews.title: Snug fit for my Glock 19, but still nice
customer_reviews.text: The screws in my Thumbdrive were constantly coming loose, and ended up even losing a couple. Bought this to replace. It’s a really nice holster. The one issue is that it’s very snug. The felt lining makes it a little difficult to pull my weapon or return it, but I think it’ll give a little with someone time. Other than that, it’s very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B

customer_reviews.title: MAKE SURE THIS IS THE CORRECT HOLSTER FOR YOUR WEAPON LIGHT
customer_reviews.text: BE AWARE: The product description only says “fits Glock 17 with light”, but does not specify what weapon-mounted light. Do your research of the full model number listed to make sure it is the correct weapon-mounted light. I bought this exact product for my Glock 17 with a TLR1-HL and this holster DID NOT work with that light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This holster fits my PX4 storm like a glove and holds the pistol very securely
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this holster from Amazon after receiving two others from gun supply companies that turned out not suitable for duty use according to insert. Those were another brand. This holster fits my PX4 storm like a glove and holds the pistol very securely. The only problem I have is since I am overweight the paddle jabs me when I sit down. If i remove the paddle there is no problem but I leave it on for added security. The problem is with my waistline, not the holster. A little more money than some others but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Carlton C. Loomis

customer_reviews.title: 6360 2832 482 For Glock 45 with Pl pro 2 Valkyrie
customer_reviews.text: First of all you will have to do some minor filing on the underside of the holster to help the trigger guard slide in more smoothly. Now feel free to order somewhere else and wait 3-4 months to get a Safariland duty holster for a 45 right now since covid has limited production... That being said it’s a good fit once you file it down to smooth out the kydex a little bit. Yes the actual model 45 holster would be ideal but 15 minutes of modification saves about 20 bucks and also means getting pretty much the exact same holster now and not months from now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MOST LIKELY A KNOCKOFF
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered from Safariland directly in the past and never had issues with fitting. I order this one on a whim and it did not fit the pistol it said it was supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Jason P

customer_reviews.title: I use it everyday for work!
customer_reviews.text: I use this holster everyday for work. It's a great brand, and holds my duty weapon securely. The price on Amazon is very competitive and the 2 day shipping is hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Green

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: Liked the fit on my Springfield MC operator with x300 wasn't a huge fan of the 3 point retention. Although very secure.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan & Megan Collins

customer_reviews.text: You can’t go wrong with safari land especially for law enforcement carry.
customer_reviews.author: Mando

customer_reviews.title: Quality and durability.
customer_reviews.text: Safariland Holsters are definitely top of the line as it shows with the price but worth every penny. Use this holster for my duty Glock 17 Gen 5 with a TLR-1 light and couldn’t be happier with the performance. Only thing I did was remove the thumb guard. Definitely recommend to anyone needing a duty holster.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Greene

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a Amazon system error.
customer_reviews.text: Although this seems like a nice holster it is not what is represented by Amazon. My understanding from this listing is that it is for a Glock 19/23 with a weapon light, which what I need. The first holster I received was for weapon only, so I thought perhaps it was just a error. So I returned the first holster and reordered it. Again holster is just for weapon only. So buyer beware!!
customer_reviews.author: MARGARET VANOUSE

customer_reviews.title: Should've done more research, my fault not the company.
customer_reviews.text: It was the wrong holster size for what I carry, but I was able to use the parts on this holster for my other one that is a safariland. No complaints, just can't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindra Houghtaling

customer_reviews.title: Very good, Very expensive.
customer_reviews.text: I guess you get what you pay for. Top quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This holster is fantastic, i switched from a black hawk and i will never go back, only one downside is i use the TLR1-HL and it hangs up on the holster with the felt just a tad other than that i love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ridered1990

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Well made product that I used for duty use. Safariland is the way to go when you want a comfortable and durable product.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Bosquez

customer_reviews.title: Wrong side sent.
customer_reviews.text: Guys... Putting the hand orientation wayyy down at the bottom and not letting anyone change that is a problem.
customer_reviews.author: batcolt

customer_reviews.title: Required gear for a lot of departments. It holds ...
customer_reviews.text: Required gear for a lot of departments. It holds the gun properly, you may need to fiddle with retention and springs. It's all done with Allen screws.
customer_reviews.author: steven clark

customer_reviews.title: level 3 holster
customer_reviews.text: The holster was sent to me right away and being left handed that doesn't happen very often. The holster is going to take some time to get use to, it is my first level 3 retention holster. After reading instructions and working with it , it didn't take to long to figure it out and to become comfortable with it. It looks good and sits well on my duty belt.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Parkin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent holster for retention
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had some padding around body facing side of holster. Hard plastic can cause some discomfort. I used black athletic tape to increase surface area and it helped. Excellent holster for retention.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dix

customer_reviews.title: Found a real GEM!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my PPQ M2, after a lil mod it fits PERFECTLY!
customer_reviews.author: Incredible Hulk

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit 228
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, very sturdy, great looking. But did not fit my Sig 228. I have an older model made in Germany and this holster was evidently made for later models. My gun will fit in the holster and I can put the hood up but the ALS will not engage
customer_reviews.author: jeffery lutzinger

customer_reviews.title: Great holster!
customer_reviews.text: Great holster! This holster came packaged well and operates very well!
customer_reviews.author: Gaston

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for my needed specifications!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my duty weapon, it has a beautiful design, but I was not sent what I ordered and will be returning. I bought this thinking that it would support my 5" m&p 2.0 pro, with a tlr-1 hl light, but it did not.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob R.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Item was used but it was in "VERY" good condition. Overall it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Vega

customer_reviews.title: Perfect holster
customer_reviews.text: Great holster , secures my weapon in a safe and non-bulky manner.
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: Wrong holster in the picture.
customer_reviews.text: This is an ad for a lightbearing holster but a non light holster arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Mick

customer_reviews.title: I have a model 5946 and this fits perfectly. ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a model 5946 and this fits perfectly. Massive improvement over my last holster. I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Knock off
customer_reviews.text: This is a knock off brand. It does not fit my Glock 17 with my TLR-1 light, as advertised. Read these negative reviews before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Callander

customer_reviews.title: Boringly perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This holster perfectly fit the described weapon. It was in new condition as advertised. I highly recommend this holster for fellow law enforcement, security, and sporting enthusiasts. It is highly secure to threats, and easy to remove your weapon from with extended training. I cannot say again how highly I recommend Safariland, their holsters, and this seller. Thanks again!
customer_reviews.author: Blair McCall

customer_reviews.title: This is a great holster and I really like the lower ride
customer_reviews.text: This is a great holster and I really like the lower ride. Just as a word of warning, I did receive the light bearing model. This is actually great for me, because I have a TLR-1 that I wasn't expecting to be able to carry. But I am docking a star because I did not receive the product I expected.
customer_reviews.author: swalton

customer_reviews.title: GREAT holster. I have used it for years now ...
customer_reviews.text: GREAT holster. I have used it for years now and not had any issues. I really like the ALS, due to the event of having to reholster while in a foot chase I know that my sidearm will not bounce out of the holster while I am running.
customer_reviews.author: CVelain

customer_reviews.title: A definite buy for any Leo
customer_reviews.text: I just got my holster today. I took that out to my sheriff office shooting range and had to use it to qualify with low light with the stream light tlr1-hl. It's worked wonders and the shipper was able to get it to me over a weekend. Only complaint I had when I got it was it was rough going into the holster but I took out the tensioner screw and it slid in and out easier for me. Overall great holster!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome holster
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd duty holster. I needed a holster that would accept the tlr-1s light i also purchased. It is top quality plus i saved about 40 bucks versus the nearest police supply store. I recommend leaving the guard on due to the hood moving forward when you sit down sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: joeyb83

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Safe duty holster for patrol. But ya gotta practice with it.
customer_reviews.author: VernJK

customer_reviews.title: Great holster for the lowest common denominator
customer_reviews.text: Great holster for the lowest common denominator. The retention systems work well to protect your weapon in a fight, but if you don't train with this holster, you'll fight to get your gun.
customer_reviews.author: DM467

customer_reviews.title: A fine product.
customer_reviews.text: I've never been disappointed with any Safariland product and same goes for this holster. It's high quality all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Skra

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I got a different holster. My 1911 gets stuck, and is difficult to remove.
customer_reviews.author: BBJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Recently bought this holster after having a level 2 holster for a few years. I felt I needed more retention for my duty weapon and wanted to add a light. With this holster, I feel much safer knowing my gun is always secure without affecting my draw. Only negative is the strength of the hood. It bends and flexes with little force.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: Two pieces fell off of this holster within less than 4 hours of use. Crap product.
customer_reviews.author: TerriD

customer_reviews.title: It’s totally worth the price!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality product, 5 stars, definitely recommend 100%! I got it to carry my Glock 17 on duty and I also bought the QLS mount for it. It’s a great holster, it’s durable, and it doesn’t scratch the finish on my slide. 5 stars. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M

customer_reviews.title: The comments stated it would fit my weapon and light ...
customer_reviews.text: The comments stated it would fit my weapon and light combination, but that was not true. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrell Moss

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Hold my glock 17 for work. I shouldve got the bigger version to hold an attachment light. But non the less thos product does what its supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this holster is amazing. It is not the first safariland holster I ...
customer_reviews.text: After "breaking in", this holster is amazing. It is not the first safariland holster I have owned, but the first holster w/light attachment. Fits like a glove. I would recommend this product to anyone. Side note, it also fits the firearm with no light attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Iamsirlion

customer_reviews.title: Gonna learn to love it
customer_reviews.text: Took that silly SLS Hood Guard right off (I know it serves a purpose), lightly sanded down the ALS guide-ramp as not to damage my front sight upon unholstering. Great holster.
customer_reviews.author: Greg S.

customer_reviews.title: I will not rate it badly as it looked very ...
customer_reviews.text: I will not rate it badly as it looked very well made and did hold the weapon as described. I did return it because I accidently ordered the wrong side.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured!! 😡
customer_reviews.text: Great holster. Only problem is the picture shows a holster that allows for a light. The description doesn't do a good enough job identifying that the actual holster does not allow for a light. Very frustrating when you're trying to get the right holster for your duty weapon.
customer_reviews.author: Tande398

customer_reviews.title: Very nice holster. I moved from the Blackhawk Sera to ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice holster. I moved from the Blackhawk Sera to this to accommodate my weapon light. The holster is a smooth draw and easy to work.
customer_reviews.author: BountyhunterQ

customer_reviews.title: Duty holster
customer_reviews.text: My Dept requires this holster . Its made by safariland, so you know the quality is top notch. Note this is a duty holster that is built to be knocked around and give you manys years of service.
customer_reviews.author: Matt E.

customer_reviews.title: great product.
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with his holster. This item was shipped in a timely manner and was very reasonably priced. I would buy another one of these in a heart beat.
customer_reviews.author: cowboy79

customer_reviews.title: The item description reads that this holster is for a ...
customer_reviews.text: The item description reads that this holster is for a Colt 1911. Well it is not. I had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: jhustle

customer_reviews.title: At first my G34 would not fit or seat into ...
customer_reviews.text: At first my G34 would not fit or seat into the holster but after two days of cartying the weapon it just started to work. It does have a break In period but it's worth it and I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Great but it is a little high on the hip. I will have to get a modification kit to lower it. It took a little time to get my draw speed up but not to long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I'm not biased towards Safariland, but this holster is by far the most reliable holster I have purchased. From an Officer Safety stand point, this holster is top-notch!
customer_reviews.author: Jmorris132

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome holster.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome holster.. I ordered this for the police academy and couldn't be happier. Fit perfect for my p226 with streamlight attached.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua w. Geddes

customer_reviews.title: Tool for the job
customer_reviews.text: Another great safariland product. My department just authorized the return of the .45 and this is the workhorse of duty holsters.
customer_reviews.author: Dave6438

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this holster. It fits great and has excellent retention with adjustments if you like it a little tighter or looser. The basket weave looks awesome and it seems like a really solid design so far.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Just what she needed
customer_reviews.text: Met the requirements needed for the police academy. the holster is good quality and just the right retention that was required.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Vega

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a tight squeeze but fits my sig 226 elite scorpion, and the TLR-1 streamlight fits perfectly
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Be careful!
customer_reviews.text: They sent a left-handed holster, despite the fact the picture, description, and paragraph all indicated the holster was right-handed.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Good holster
customer_reviews.text: Delivered quickly as promised, been using it on duty ever since. Although I did have to adjust to holster tension a little but because gun was getting stuck at first. Other than that, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Dh

customer_reviews.title: Love the holster
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Glock 34 with a TLR-1 or my Surefire X300. Love the holster
customer_reviews.author: Shawn M.

customer_reviews.title: Great holster
customer_reviews.text: I bought this holster to use with the TLR-1HL and I added the Streamlight TLR 1&2 remote contoured switch. It fit great with this holster I couldn't be more satisfied with this combo. I took off the belt mount and mounted it to my thigh rig. I use the same holster as my duty holster.
customer_reviews.author: James Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Thought I was getting a safariland compatable with a tac light like the picture shows but didnt
customer_reviews.text: If you are ordering this holster from here based on photo, DONT!!. Thought I was getting a safariland compatable with a tac light like the picture shows but didnt.....(twice after returning the first ine). Won't deal on here again
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: SAFARILAND 6360 LIGHT BEARING HOLSTER
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding holster. Works with or without weapon mounted light. Fits my Glock 22 with a surefire X300 ULTRA like a glove with no modifications. Easy to use with off hand. I am 100% for safariland holsters and would recommend it to any LEO.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: and it holds up great, and is faster to draw and holster than ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this style holster for six years now, and it holds up great, and is faster to draw and holster than any other duty holster I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Sheepdog

customer_reviews.title: Very good holster. Wear it every day at work
customer_reviews.text: Very good holster. Wear it every day at work. Highly reccomend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Dumond

customer_reviews.title: works great looks
customer_reviews.text: Must have for anyone in law enforcement; works great looks
customer_reviews.author: Mark Andres

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent holster and it retains very well. So good you may fool yourself.
customer_reviews.author: brandon binford

customer_reviews.title: Got a left hand one for my husband. He ...
customer_reviews.text: Got a left hand one for my husband. He loves it. This is the product that you'll never regret to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Skyeee

customer_reviews.title: Do it.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, just awesome, had to send it back caise it didn't fit the sights on my glock
customer_reviews.author: Shon P.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and workmanship. Fits the duty weapon like a glove. Had no problem with the light attached TTL
customer_reviews.author: John Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It's does not fit my glock 17 with a TLR-1 HL tac light
customer_reviews.author: Christen

customer_reviews.title: great deal solid holster
customer_reviews.text: Great holster, fits my glock 30sf perfect, dont be fooled this is not a light bearing holster
customer_reviews.author: Foxxmx

customer_reviews.title: The new standard for on-duty holsters.
customer_reviews.text: The ALS in tandem with the SLS strikes an outstanding balance between speed and security. After a day of working the system, I am confident that this is the last holster I may ever buy. The STX shell is also great... no more fake leather that shows damage. I took the shroud off of mine (which you can do in minutes).
customer_reviews.author: JMF

customer_reviews.title: Excellent holster holding up well so far only reason for ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent holster holding up well so far only reason for not giving 5 stars is the hood squeaks when opened
customer_reviews.author: Cammie Brost

customer_reviews.title: Secure
customer_reviews.text: The Level III system was excellent. A different system and it was checked out by several of the law enforcement during my husband's defensive training update.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Reed

customer_reviews.title: Now it works like a champ
customer_reviews.text: Not intended to fit the Glock-41. With a heat gun I was able to warm up the Kydex material and push my Glock-41 in all the way down. Now it works like a champ!! Safariland now has two holsters that "CAN" fit a Glock-41
customer_reviews.author: DennisDillon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it I'm glad I chose to get it from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Cathleen Rogers

customer_reviews.title: MK 25 with light.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Safariland product. Simply put it's great! Got this for a MK 25 with TLR-1 light. Took some adjusting and breaking in but it works perfectly. Has some felt on the inside to help with wear on the firearm. The Level 3 retention will take some practice if you are not used it. My draw is almost as fast with this as a level 2 holster. With more practice it should be the same.
customer_reviews.author: Kc

customer_reviews.title: Safety
customer_reviews.text: This holster is great for my uniform. went perfect with my web gear. This Holster has also made it very hard for any person trying to take my weapon. the levels of safeties on this holster gives me that split second to react and defend myself. I am able to focus on my job since I have that extra sense of security
customer_reviews.author: N8DAGR8

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: As long as you have the serial it is easy to find.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was able to get it for a very good price, just got lucky
customer_reviews.text: I was able to get it for a very good price, just got lucky. Had to do some minor adjustments to adjust draw but still kept great retention.
customer_reviews.author: A.J.

customer_reviews.title: Very good holster.
customer_reviews.text: Very good holster. I lime the date double retention on it for added security. Recogment this to anyone in Law Enforcement or Security.
customer_reviews.author: Will Lopez

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It seem really cheap like it woulnt carry the gun well.
customer_reviews.author: romelia garcia

customer_reviews.title: Nice holster.
customer_reviews.text: Well, it seems to be well made, and shipping was pretty quick. I've had other Safariland products and this seems just as well made, but, I can't say that I have first hand knowledge of how it wears or handles, because I bought this for a buddy who gave me cash to buy it. He can't order anything himself via credit card or have it shipped to his house for fear of his wife finding out that he spent money on a new toy. Can you say "WHOOPED!!" He does seem to like it though, when she gives his pair back to him and he can use it LOL!
customer_reviews.author: Todd

product_meta.title: Safariland, 6360, ALS/SLS, Level 3 Retention Duty Holster, Left Hand
feature_bullets: Level 3 retention, Mid-Ride sits just above the belt, fits 2" belt loop
ALS (Automatic Locking System) secures weapon once holstered. Offered for weapons with and without rail mounted light
SLS (Self Locking System) Rotating Hood for protection against attempted takeaways
Safari Laminate thermal-molded construction protects handgun and sights

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
